name: Sudharshan TK
intro: Chartered Accountant by Profession & Software Developer by Passion. I Create Elegant, Modern, Sleeky UI's. I Love Javascript, Nodejs & Flutter. Currently Focussing more on Backend Development Like Nodejs and Django. I am Also Interested in Topics such as Accounting, Finance, Taxation.
objective: I want to improve my finance knowledge and combine it with programming, leveraging my organization to reach great heights, thereby achieving personal growth.
subtitle: Chartered Accountant | Web Developer
address: No. 71/36, 2nd Floor, TP Koil Street, Triplicane, Chennai - 600005, INDIA

workExperience.title: Price Waterhouse Coopers (PwC)
workExperience.subtitle: Mar 2022 - Present | Chennai
detailsList: Been part of Oracle FCCS & ERP Implementation team.

Developed artifacts starting from Metadata creation/updates, setting up Ownership module, catering to Intercompany eliminations in FCCS, designing web forms and data grids, creating validation accounts, Data locking.
Experience in Oracle Data Management & Financial Reporting Studio
Designed Multiple Statutory & MIS Reports Based on IND AS as required by the client.

workExperience.title: Ford Rhodes Parks & Co. LLP
workExperience.subtitle: Mar 2019 - Mar 2022 | Chennai
detailsList: Performed statutory audit, certifications, Tax and GST audits of financial statements of large corporate and non-corporate clients.
Carried out Various GST assignments relating to Advisory & Compliances, including tax payments & Reconciliation (GSTR 2A to Books) Assignments.
Filed Various Income Tax Returns from ITR 1 to ITR 7.
Prepared Books of Accounts & Financial Statements as per Schedule III of Various Corporate Entities.
